email.invalid: Please enter a valid email format.

password.minCharacter: Password should contain minimum of {{ minCharacterCount }} characters.
password.maxCharacter: Password should contain maximum of {{ maxCharacterCount }} characters.
password.repeatingCharacters: Password should not contain repeating numbers, letters, or special characters.
password.smallAndCapitalLetter: Password should contain at least one small and one capital letter.
password.oneNumber: Password should contain at least one number.
password.oneSpecialCharacter: Password should contain at special character.

share.invalidResolution: Uploaded image {{ resolution }} is more than {{ maxResolution }}s, please upload an image with lower {{ resolution }}. Current image {{ resolution }} {{ currentResolution }}px`
